oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: =kasin (Klaas Katkop) (IV)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: How to combine |kururu poison with that of the puffadder's glands and Boom Gift to smear on arrow-heads to shoot game with. 1) p.3518v: the mixed poison appears to have been smeared on the tip of the arrow, 2) See also The |kururu (|xabbe, or 'Kritje'), 3) This story is found in Book IV-2.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mixing arrow poisons
